titleStmt.title: Utrum horum, or, God's ways of disposing of kingdoms and some clergy-men's ways of disposing of them.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by BM to William Henry, Prince of Orange. Cf. BM, v. 258, col. 49.
Originally attributed by Wing to William Lloyd, probably on the basis of Lloyd's work entitled: A discourse of God's ways of disposing of kingdoms ... Wing (2nd ed.) cancels number L2719.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
Entry for L2719 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
